TEXT.BODY:
Sept 25 end Primary shr 31 cts vs 22 cts Diluted shr 30 cts vs 21 cts Net 5,019,000 vs 3,165,000 Revs 80.1 mln vs 57.2 mln Primary avg shrs 16,306,000 vs 14,495,000 Diluted avg shrs 17,266,000 vs 15,827,000
Nine months Primary shr 1.27 dlrs vs 1.07 dlrs Diluted shr 1.23 dlrs vs 1.03 dlrs Net 20.2 mln vs 15.5 mln Revs 244.5 mln vs 181.5 mln Primary avg shrs 15,875,000 vs 14,495,000 Diluted avg shrs 16,853,000 vs 15,280,000 NOTE: Results are pro forma, assuming that company was public throughout 1986. Company became public Feb 14, 1986. Reuter
